<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Ansible Tower Manage Use Case">22ad7a1b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcb0a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:fead3a5b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcbe6</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Populate the Use Case</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   var use_case = g_form.getReference('ansible_tower_use_case_lookup',update_form);
}

function update_form(use_case){
	// alert('Setting ORG values!');
	g_form.setValue('use_case_name',use_case.name);
	g_form.setValue('use_case_description',use_case.description);
	g_form.setValue('use_case_technical_owner',use_case.technical_owner);
	g_form.setValue('use_case_documentation_url',use_case.documentation);
	var action = g_form.getValue(request_type);
	if ( action == 'delete') {
		g_form.setReadOnly('use_case_name',true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('use_case_description',true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('use_case_techical_owner',true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('use_case_documentation_url',true);   
	}	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>e663988</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-18 15:50:58</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b6ad3a5b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcbf4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate the Use Case</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower" source="x_ibmss_gts_oar_at">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b6ad3a5b1bd6a4505e72ebd5604bcbf4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>e663988</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-18 15:50:58</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
